input.sentences: on our weekly sunday drive | we came across this greek orthodox church several miles outside of town .
the church building 's architecture was stunning and very different from the normal buildings in this area .
i was struck on how narrow the building seemed to appear .
this rustic gate seemed very historical in it 's design .
it was thrilled to have happened upon this interesting place so close to home .
output.sentences: Being in a different country, we decided to go to their place of worship on Sunday.
When we saw the church, it was stunning!
It was gold and white, sort of a narrow building.
It looked very historical, even the gate was rustic.
After it was over, we were thrilled to go home, but had to take one last look at its beauty.
